name: Chicken Rampage
description:
A quickfire game based on a Warioware inspiration.

Created by Kyle Beaton and Cameron Hagney

___


CONTROLS

Mouse only - Click and drag!

___

The idea is simple, catch the chicken and put it in the Pen.
If this was to continue development, then a fail washout would be implemented, a quality background made, sounds and input applied and update and beatify the game in general.

The concept was to explore the idea of being able to learn how to throw an object in a 2D space, but unable to find an effective way to implement it (Along with research into a bow and arrow style firing mechanism) it was ultimately decided that the game would be made as a simple fast moving chicken to test the eye and precision of the user!

As it is a prototype, Id love to hear and read feedback from you as to where you can see a concept like this expand into!
